uniequip_002_tinman.name: Shriveled Soul
uniequip_002_tinman.EN: Increases the continuous damage dealt to ground enemies in range of Tin Man's Alchemical Units by 20%
uniequip_002_tinman.CN: 使自身炼金单元影响范围内地面敌人受到的持续伤害提高20%
uniequip_002_tinman.mod: 使自身炼金单元影响范围内地面敌人受到的持续伤害提高23%

uniequip_002_wulfen.name: 探险家的从容
uniequip_002_wulfen.CN: 可以使用4<@ba.talpu>（+1）</>个矿石“杀手”（最多拥有4个），矿石“杀手”被部署后准备一段时间可以主动引爆
uniequip_002_wulfen.mod: 每个矿石“杀手”引爆时范围内的敌人数量大于等于2个时，伤害提升8%

uniequip_002_wulfen.name: 探险家的从容
uniequip_002_wulfen.CN: 可以使用4<@ba.talpu>（+1）</>个矿石“杀手”（最多拥有4个），矿石“杀手”被部署后准备一段时间可以主动引爆
uniequip_002_wulfen.mod: 每个矿石“杀手”引爆时范围内的敌人数量大于等于2个时，伤害提升12%

uniequip_003_gnosis.name: Two Paths, One Goal
uniequip_003_gnosis.EN: Grants <$ba.buffres>Resist</> to all [Karlan Trade] Operators after Gnosis has been deployed for 10 seconds
uniequip_003_gnosis.CN: 灵知在场且部署后经过10秒时，使所有【喀兰贸易】干员获得<$ba.buffres>抵抗</>
uniequip_003_gnosis.mod: 灵知在场且部署后经过10秒时，使所有【喀兰贸易】干员获得<$ba.buffres>抵抗</>，且攻击力+10%

uniequip_003_vigil.name: Wolven Nature
uniequip_003_vigil.EN: Vigil and the Wolfpack's attacks ignore 175 DEF when attacking enemies blocked by the Wolfpack
uniequip_003_vigil.CN: 敌人被狼群阻挡时，伺夜和狼群对其的攻击无视其175防御力
uniequip_003_vigil.mod: 敌人被狼群阻挡时，伺夜和狼群对其的攻击无视其175防御力，并偷取其15点防御力（最高100点）

uniequip_003_vigil.name: Wolven Nature
uniequip_003_vigil.EN: Vigil and the Wolfpack's attacks ignore 200 <@ba.talpu>(+25)</> DEF when attacking enemies blocked by the Wolfpack
uniequip_003_vigil.CN: 敌人被狼群阻挡时，伺夜和狼群对其的攻击无视其200<@ba.talpu>（+25）</>防御力
uniequip_003_vigil.mod: 敌人被狼群阻挡时，伺夜和狼群对其的攻击无视其200<@ba.talpu>（+25）</>防御力，并偷取其15点防御力（最高100点）

uniequip_003_sleach.name: Spiritual Influence
uniequip_003_sleach.EN: After deployment, the next Operator has -2 DP Cost
uniequip_003_sleach.CN: 部署后，下一名部署的干员费用-2
uniequip_003_sleach.mod: 部署后，下一名部署的干员费用-2, 若该干员为地面干员，则部署后获得1点部署费用

uniequip_003_sleach.name: Spiritual Influence
uniequip_003_sleach.EN: After deployment, the next Operator has -2 DP Cost
uniequip_003_sleach.CN: 部署后，下一名部署的干员费用-2
uniequip_003_sleach.mod: 部署后，下一名部署的干员费用-2, 若该干员为地面干员，则部署后获得2点部署费用

uniequip_003_bgsnow.name: Stenographer of Weaknesses
uniequip_003_bgsnow.EN: Attacks from the 'Typewriter' reduce the target's DEF by 18% for 4 seconds; if the 'Typewriter' is placed within the 4 tiles adjacent to Pozëmka, this effect increases to 23%
uniequip_003_bgsnow.CN: “打字机”的攻击会使命中目标的防御力下降18%，持续4秒；若“打字机”放在鸿雪周围四格则效果提升至23%
uniequip_003_bgsnow.mod: “打字机”的攻击会使命中目标的防御力下降23%，持续4秒；若“打字机”放在鸿雪周围八格则效果提升至28%

uniequip_003_bgsnow.name: Stenographer of Weaknesses
uniequip_003_bgsnow.EN: Attacks from the 'Typewriter' reduce the target's DEF by 20% <@ba.talpu>(+2%)</> for 5 <@ba.talpu>(+1)</> seconds; if the 'Typewriter' is placed within the 4 tiles adjacent to Pozëmka, this effect increases to <@ba.talpu>25% (+2%)</>

uniequip_003_bgsnow.CN: “打字机”的攻击会使命中目标的防御力下降20%<@ba.talpu>（+2%）</>，持续5<@ba.talpu>（+1）</>秒；若“打字机”放在鸿雪周围四格则效果提升至25%<@ba.talpu>（+2%）</>
